meanings.definition: A person or thing that scrolls.
meanings.sent1: The scroller on the computer mouse helps move the cursor.
meanings.sent2: I need a scroller to read the rest of the article.
meanings.sent3: The little robot scroller scrolled through the book at lightning speed.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a scroller, swiftly scanning the room for any signs of trouble.
meanings.sent5: The scroller in the library was worn out from years of use.

meanings.definition: A device or tool used for scrolling.
meanings.sent1: The touchpad on the laptop serves as a scroller for web pages.
meanings.sent2: I prefer using a physical scroller rather than touch screen scrolling.
meanings.sent3: The magical scroller allowed the user to scroll with just a wave of their hand.
meanings.sent4: The scroller on the side of the screen resembled an ancient scroll unfurling.
meanings.sent5: The scroller on the old computer was sticky and hard to use.

meanings.definition: A person who scrolls through content on a screen.
meanings.sent1: As a dedicated scroller, she spent hours browsing social media.
meanings.sent2: The scroller quickly found the information they were looking for.
meanings.sent3: The sleepy scroller accidentally scrolled past the important message.
meanings.sent4: He was a master scroller, able to navigate through pages effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The scroller's thumb was sore from all the scrolling on the phone.
